data.title: Turbo Touch
data.meta_description: People from all over New Zealand are now getting together with the friends, family and colleagues to take to the Turbo Touch® field or court.
data.text:
2023 Tournament Dates:

2023 Secondary School Turbo Touch Championships Auckland

Date: Friday 23rd June 2023

Venue: The Trusts Arena, Auckland - Click here for directions

Time: 9:00am - 3:00pm

Cost: $230 per team (Max 10 players per team)

Grades: Boys, Girls and Mixed - mixed configuration 5 players on the court - ideally 2 female players and 3 male players however teams can take the court with 4 players minimum of 1 female and nomore than 3 male players.

Registrations: https://www.sporty.co.nz/viewform/232944

Registrations close: Thursday 1st June 2023

Turbo N vibeZ

Postponed until 2024. More information to come ealry next year.

Past Events:

2022 Turbo Touch Beach Series: Mairangi Bay, Auckland

Date: Sunday 20th February 2022

Venue: Mairangi Bay - Harbour Beach Volley Ball Centre - Click here for directions

Cost: $160 per team or $20 individual

Time: 10am - 4pm

Grades: Open mixed grades (2 male and 2 female players on the court at all times)

2022 Turbo Touch Beach Series: Mission Bay, Auckland

Date: Sunday 20th March 2022

Venue: Mission Bay, Auckland - Click here for directions

Cost: $160 per team or $20 individual

Time: 10am - 4pm

Grades: Open mixed grades (2 male and 2 female players on the court at all times)​​​​

​​​​​​​2022 Secondary School Turbo Touch Championships

Date: Thursday 7th July 2022

Venue: The Trusts Arena, Auckland - Click here for directions

Time: 9:00am - 3:00pm

Cost: $200 per team (Max 10 players per team)

Grades: Boys, Girls and Mixed - mixed configuration 5 players on the court - ideally 2 female players and 3 male players however teams can take the court with 4 players minimum of 1 female and nomore than 3 male players.

Note: We have space for 5 more teams (3 mixed, 1 Girls & 1 Boys). This will be filled on first come first served basis and then we will start our waiting list.

Registrations: Click Here

Registrations close: Monday 27th June 2022

Details & enquiries: Contact: Mark Robinson M: 022 032 2791 or do@touchnz.co.nz
